replies.author: Flame3
replies.txt_content: = =我一般造略恐怖东西的时候采用这个方法...

That's covering just about all :) You can use this idea and apply to your village/town/hamlet buildings. I do not need credits, but if you used this blog to build your stuff, you are welcome but not obliged to refer to my name. Again, if you think this isn't complete, tell me what should be added!
这包括你所有的：）你可以使用这个观念应用到你的乡/镇/村的建筑。我不需要的学分，但是如果你用这个博客来建立您的东西，欢迎你但没有义务提起我的名字。再次，如果你认为这是不完整的，告诉我应该怎么说！
